page.title: 16A day in my life
page.content: A typical Sunday for me would start at 7 a.m. when I get up and put my clothes on. At ten past I go downstairs and have my breakfast.At half past seven we put the boat on the trailer and connect the trailer to the car.By eight o'clock we are on the way to Worthing to go sailing.When we get there we have a cup of tea. We take the trailer off the car and go into the boat park.We put the boat together and by 9.30 we are dressing in our wet suits.We push the boat off the beach and wait for the race to start.By 10 o'clock the cannon goes 'BANG' and we are off.Two hours later the race is over and we return to the beach.We have a cup of coffee.We then have dinner in the club house.We put the boat in the compound and set off for home.On the way we stop at Jack & Jill windmills.We have tea at home.
